attributes.action: ensure that any future equality, or anti-discrimination, legislation has to be complied with immediately (or as soon as practicable)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1970 employers were given FIVE YEARS to implement the Equal Pay Act; time which they used instead to get their lawyers to go through it with a fine-tooth comb looking for loopholes.  They found plenty; this is almost certainly why, 37 years later, we STILL read reports of the gender pay gap!
